name: Dark  Facebook (NO ADS)
description: Dark  Facebook Style without any kind of ads, and more friendly for your eyes...
additional_info:
Created by: Chris

Updates:
  • October 28, 2021 - Disabled old styles (starting rewrite)
  • October 07, 2021 - Fixed messenger message reaction background
  • October 29, 2019 - Fixed gif search background
  • February 16, 2019 - Added dark grey background
  • December 24, 2017 - Fixed new comment background
  • October 30, 2017 - Sponsored link colors
  • August 08, 2017 - Share text color fix
  • March 28, 2017 - Event text colour fixes
  • December 8, 2016 - Poll background
  • January 18, 2016 - Wall element fixes
  • December 16, 2015 - Fixed photo overlay comment feed backgrounds
  • November 11, 2015 - Border colour enhancements, and left sidebar fix.
  • July 07, 2015 - Some border enhancements, and background colour updates.
  • May 21, 2015 - Experimental set of FontAwesome for header icons.
  • May 02, 2015 - Page footer update, and experimental tinypic hosted iconset.
  • February 14, 2015 - Wall post order ticker position, and profile box background fixed.
  • December 01, 2014 - Text colour fixes.
  • October 12, 2014 - Added background option for simple colour (more colours coming soon).
  • August 27, 2014 - Left side navigation updated.
  • August 20, 2014 - Fixed link colors.
  • August 12, 2014 - Improvement for name on profile page cover.
  • July 23, 2014 - Updated header backgrounds.
  • July 13, 2014 - Background of notification badge updated.
  • July 12, 2014 - Background on right side update's popup darkened.
  • July 09, 2014 - Some small fix for the updated header and search field.
  • June 08, 2014 - Improvement for the right notification area.
  • June 04, 2014 - More fixes for the "new" layout.
  • May 11, 2014 - Fix for image popup window.
  • March 21, 2014 - Some more fixes for the "new" layout.
  • March 19, 2014 - Updated whole layout colorus for the uniformed design.
  • February 22, 2014 - Link borders reduced, and fixed right column.
  • December 18, 2013 - Spice up for sticky timeline headers.
  • November 13, 2013 - Fixed app center issues.
  • September 28, 2013 - Fixed some link colorus on photo pages (and an interference with others).
  • September 13, 2013 - Timeline event notification improvement.
  • September 09, 2013 - Sidebar transparency, and bug fixes.
  • September 08, 2013 - Global style improvements, and some fixes of several original's bugs also.
  • September 07, 2013 - Improved profile images. (No effect on positioning!)
  • August 28, 2013 - Fixed top menu icons after FB update.
  • August 18, 2013 - Improved profile pages.
  • July 21, 2013 - Fixed chat and translation bar on the bottom right corner.
  • July 14, 2013 - Facelift on profile cover.
  • May 22, 2013 - Fixed search icon, 2 links on the top bar, and the top right menu improved.
  • April 25, 2013 - Improved chat design.
  • April 24, 2013 - Fixed Facebook logo.
  • April 04, 2013 - Some fixes and improvements while Facebook also changes.
  • March 29, 2013 - Fixes for the new Facebook layout.
  • March 15, 2013 - Fixes for permalinked posts page.
  • Jan 6, 2013 - Fixed the annoying couple styled login screen.
  • Jan 4, 2013 - Added opacity for header drop-down menus, and chat dock.
  • Jan 3, 2013 - Added opacity for notification counter, and removed plugin styles which was added before for some fixes.
  • Jan 2, 2013 - Added transparency for search box, shadow for the whole content and background fix for requests and messages icons.
